name: Soul-Bound
description:
Take control of your character as well as your soul as you try to navigate the dungeon full of puzzles. This game has 24 levels with different mechanics introduced progressively as you go through each level.

Made in 48 hours for the ICT GameJam Winter 2022 as well as the Global GameJam 2022.

  • Controls:
  • Movement - A,D, Arrow Keys
  • Jump - Spacebar, Up Arrow
  • Reset - R
  • Main Menu - Esc
  • Skip Level - N

Credits:

Programmer: Ramil Hinshaw

Pixel Artist: Ramil Hinshaw

SFX: Ultimate SFX Bundle

Music: One Man Symphony - onemansymphony.com
